This method was tested with the STEAM_UNLOCKED and SKIDROW versions.

DONT work with BLACKBOX (ripped MP) version!
Why do you upload something you haven't tried? makes no sense..

You can not add friends in Steam when you do not have at least one legit game already bound to your account. This means even IF this works, the moment Steam bans you, you waste at least one legit bought game. 

Avoid this and try green luma or such

ty for trying
